dictionary.definition: “Anything but clothes” theme party in which guests can come naked or draped in non-traditional coverups, such as duct tape, boxes, newspaper.
In a long-term relationship when a couple only has sex on anniversaries, birthdays, and Christmas.
Fetish for baths or showers that usually centers around a naked person lathering themselves up.
"Adult breast feeding." The abbreviation is mainly used in the fetish world and in fetish porn.
A pregnancy that was not planned by at least one member of a couple.
A fetish for hairless genitals. Similar to: gynelophilous, hirsutophilia, hyphephilia, pubephilia, trichophilia.
1. The head of a penis. 2. A small penis.
A fetish for having sex in high places such as on mountains or rooftops. Some members of the mile high club have this fetish.
A fetish for amputees and their shortened limbs.
A fetish, or preference, for circumcised men.
A fetish involving sounds. This can include such things as being aroused by music or a partner's moaning.
A fetish for sun exposure. This is often a fetish of tanorexics, fans of outdoor sex, or those who only date really tan people.
A fetish for acting, dressing, or being treated like an adolescent.
